arguments.name: X
arguments.description: The value for which you want the distribution.

arguments.name: Mean
arguments.description: The arithmetic mean of the distribution.

arguments.name: Standard_dev
arguments.description: The standard deviation of the distribution.

arguments.name: Cumulative
arguments.description: A logical value that determines the form of the function. If cumulative is TRUE, NORM.DIST returns the cumulative distribution function; if FALSE, it returns the probability density function.
